name: template-extractor-archives
description: This Repository is a collection of predefined templates. You can download the `archives/` and use them locally with the [Template Extractor Tool](https://gitlab.lupcom.de/jbath/template-extractor).

scripts.build: tsc && node postProcess.js $npm_config_dir && rm -f ./archives/$npm_config_dir.zip && cd $npm_config_dir && zip -r ../archives/$npm_config_dir.zip . && cd ..

author: Lupcom
